subject: Obesity
Running
Exercise
Eating Disorders
lead_paragraph: Jarmo Pitkanen, who is 5-foot-11, gained 100 pounds to run his first multiple-day endurance footrace and is on a quest to be one of the world’s rare obese endurance athletes.
snippet: Jarmo Pitkanen, who is 5-foot-11, gained 100 pounds to run his first multiple-day endurance footrace and is on a quest to be one of the world’s rare obese endurance athletes.
